text: [clears throat]
Um..

I know it says,
"Black tie optional"

but this-this may be
pushing it a little.
Um..
I'm not gonna go.
You're not gonna go?

No, I think I'm gonna catch up
on my correspondence.

How-how, um, how can
you not be going?

I'm not gonna go
so I think that will accomplish
the not going.

Um, you know,
just out of curiosity..

Well, ever since I was
humiliated and yelled at

in front of my friends,
I'm just, I don't know

not in a very museum-benefity
kind of mood.
Right, yeah. Okay, okay.

God, I'm sorry.
I'm sorry, I yelled.

- That's fine.
- No, but you're-you're mad.

I'm not mad.
I'm just not going.

- You're not going.
- Right.
Okay.
You know that I-I have to go?

- Mm-hmm.
- Right?
So is it gonna be like

I'm abandoning you
while you're upset?

- No.
- No?

- Because you're not upset.
- Right.

- About the yelling?
- Right. And humiliating.

O-of course,
the humiliating.
So-so we, we're okay.

- Mm-hmm.
- We're good.

- Right.
- Okay.

- Honey?
- Yes, Ross.

- I love you.
- Mm-hmm.

- 'Get away from the phone!'
- 'Aw!'
She's just getting dressed.

Is it wrong that
I was totally aroused by that?

Okay, buddy boy,
here it is.

You hide my clothes,
I'm wearing everything you own.
Oh, my God!

That is so not the opposite
of taking somebody's underwear!

Look at me!
I'm Chandler!

Could I be wearing
any more clothes?

Maybe if I wasn't
going commando..
[groaning]
Yeah. Whoo!

I tell you, it's hot
with all this stuff on.

I, uh, I better not do
any, I don't know, lunges.

Okay, okay. Enough,
enough of the lunging.

No, I'm sick of this, okay? I've
had it up to here with you two.

Neither of you
can come to the party.

[scoffing]
Geez, what a baby.
